message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SD 

This paper proposes a method for extracting pseudo-parallel monolingual sentence pairs from comparable corpora, which is a common task in natural language processing and falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The method relies on pre-trained embeddings of documents and sentences, which suggests the use of machine learning techniques such as artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also evaluates the effectiveness of the method through automatic and extrinsic evaluation, which involves measuring the performance of the method on a specific task, indicating the use of information retrieval (cs.IR) and software engineering (cs.SD) techniques.
